channel.title: I came
channel.description:
1.8 features...
NPC villages Randomly generated dungeons New biome code Fully working Creative Mode (and individual admins can enter Creative Mode on a Survival Mode server if they choose) Critical hits [b]Sprinting More farming options[/b]

item.title: I came
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:36, topic:402753”]We’re holding your hand already with big brother, LWC, and now residence to help protect you from people

Why are we tying your shoes too, saving you from features that are already in the game…

I agree that we should be helping with the things people do to hurt others (but again, why do we have PvP enabled then…), but what can be your reasoning to nerf creepers?[/quote]
Herp derp Davidi2, when a person leads the creeper to your home and makes it explode is that really your fault?

Read full topic

item.title: I came
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

We’re holding your hand already with big brother, LWC, and now residence to help protect you from people

Why are we tying your shoes too, saving you from features that are already in the game…

I agree that we should be helping with the things people do to hurt others (but again, why do we have PvP enabled then…), but what can be your reasoning to nerf creepers?

Read full topic

item.title: I came
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I disagree with creeper explosions because they cause problems. If you enable residence then sure you’ll be able to protect an area or two (even three) but what happens when you need to expand? It’s just bad when you come back and find the place griefed because of 99 creeper explosions.

Now if big brother was to reverse creeper explosions…

Read full topic

item.title: I came
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Davidi2:

But seriously, can we enable creeper explosions?

Put it to a vote!

Read full topic

item.title: I came
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:31, topic:402753”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=499809.msg3656497#msg3656497 date=1310061885]
I think with each update there should be a new map…
[/quote]I think most people would quit if that happened…[/quote]

I would have to agree, nobody would bother to start a big project and you would see nothing but dirt huts for miles

@mironic: minecraft is easily going to go over 2.0 before its officially out of beta, considering the official release date is in november

Read full topic

item.title: I came
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Personally I don’t think that just dropping everything and going far away is at all the same, unless a few people do it at the same time. It’s the whole ‘starting over as a group’ thing that I like, seeing people build from the ground up ya know. And because we have speed hackers and nether, it’s not even that difficult for other players to get to you.

I know it’s all a mentality, but that’s how it is in my mind, and isn’t very appealing :S

But seriously, can we enable creeper explosions?

Read full topic

item.title: I came
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:25, topic:402753”]The reason there will never be another map reset is simple.

Players that want a reset have an option on the current map, drop everything, go far away, start over.

Players that don’t want a reset have no option if we actually reset.[/quote]We never got that option before D:

Read full topic

item.title: I came
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I still want a map reset. Then again I’m just used to starting a new map on single player and that is not possible on multiplayer so I will just learn to adapt and work with a single map for a long time.

Who knows, it might just get reset again…

Read full topic

item.title: I came

But wait until 1.8 ofc

[/quote]

Shows your immaturity and the grudge youve held since our last discussion[/quote]

item.title: I came
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:19, topic:402753”]I would have been all for a map reset about a week ago but after ive started another project i wouldnt want to lose it now, i suggest moving spawn to a far away place.

But wait until 1.8 ofc[/quote]That’s my new theory:

If you’re bored with your current work and want a new project you’re all for a reset.
If you’re currently working on something, you’re against a reset.

Personally I’m bored as hell so I want a reset, maybe if I can get a new project started I wont…

Read full topic

item.title: I came

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:15, topic:402753”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=499809.msg3655533#msg3655533 date=1309985520]
No map reset.

I have come to far to be reset, and moparisthebest won’t do it. Map resets should be only if we have no choice.
[/quote]

Exactly.[/quote]
i share your pain Mopar, on my server people complain on the forums for a map reset aswell. even after i reset the map for the first time. 2 days later they ask for a reset again and im like … Fuck off…
